Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.3 Paccayavāra » 2.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
Kusalattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
118.
437Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā…  tīṇi.
438Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā…  tīṇi.
439Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā.
440Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā khandhā.
441(Yathā hetupaccayaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
